controls.caption: Cast to byte
controls.name: castTo8U
controls.description:
If this flag is true, and if the source matrix is not byte (CV_8U or CV_8S), it will be automatically cast to CV_8U. (If this flag is false, non-byte labels will lead to an exception.)
Note: it is simple cast, without any scaling.
Note: 16- or 32-bit labels will be cast incorrectly, if they contain too high values (>255): they will be replaced with 255. But it is not too important, because this function switchs to other (slower and universal) algorithm, if the number of elements in the translation table >255.
